sentence: Social media users are revisiting the controversial history of Bugs Bunny cartoons after Florida Governor Ron DeSantis claimed that Disney is pushing for certain topics in its cartoons.
author: Fatma Khaled
title: Bugs Bunny's Controversial History Revisited After Ron DeSantis' Comments

sentence: By his side in the bar was Floridas governor, Ron DeSantis, a likely candidate for the partys 2024 presidential nomination who was fresh off his legislation punishing Disney for opposing his new law baring instruction on sexual orientation and gender identity in kindergarten through the third grade.
author: KEN RITTER and NICHOLAS RICCARDI
title: GOP pins hopes on Nevada's Laxalt to help win Senate control
